person.persName: Henderson Eversole (Perry County, Kentucky, farm laborer and officers 7th KY Inf USA)

body.p: Perry County, Kentucky, farm laborer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Rebecca Bowling Eversole in Perry County in July 1865. Farm laborer in Perry County in 1860. Served in the 7th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as private, corporal, first sergeant, and first lieutenant from September 22, 1861, to September 24, 1864.
